entry.string: The current Multisites Module assists with the creation of Xaraya multisites. A Site Administrator can create and run multiple Xaraya sites from a single installation of the Xaraya code base. There is currently a review of multisite logic in Xaraya code in order to provide the functionality we ultimately are aiming for.
entry.translation: Zee coorrent Moolteesites Mudoole-a esseests veet zee creeshun ooff Xereya moolteesites. A Seete-a Edmeenistretur cun creete-a und roon moolteeple-a Xereya seetes frum a seengle-a instelleshun ooff zee Xereya cude-a bese-a. Zeere-a is coorrently a refeeoo ooff moolteesite-a lugeec in Xereya cude-a in oorder tu prufeede-a zee fooncshuneleety ve-a ulteemetely ere-a eeeming fur. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: At this time, the Multisites Module creates the scripts and directories required to run your multisites.
entry.translation: Et thees teeme-a, zee Moolteesites Mudoole-a creetes zee screepts und durectureees reqooured tu roon yuoor moolteesites. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: To use Xaraya multisites, you must have all domain and subdomains that you wish to use for your 'subsites' resolving to the same IP as your master Xaraya site domain name, or pointed to the same directory as your main Xaraya install.
entry.translation: Tu use-a Xereya moolteesites, yuoo moost hefe-a ell dumeeen und soobdumeeens thet yuoo veesh tu use-a fur yuoor 'soobseetes' resulfeeng tu zee seme-a IP es yuoor mester Xereya seete-a dumeeen neme-a, oor pueented tu zee seme-a durectury es yuoor meeen Xereya instell.

entry.string: Assuming you already have installed Xaraya, we'll call this the 'master' site, you must then run the Xaraya Installer for each additional site you wish to install. This will create the database tables for each of your new sites. Make sure you protect the master config.system.php file found in the /var directory so that it is not overwritten by each additional subsite install process. Copy it out, and then put it back when you have finished the install for the subsite(s).
entry.translation: Essoomeeng yuoo elreedy hefe-a instelled Xereya, ve'll cell thees zee 'mester' seete-a, yuoo moost zeen roon zee Xereya Insteller fur iech eddeeshunel seete-a yuoo veesh tu instell. Thees veell creete-a zee detebese-a tebles fur iech ooff yuoor noo seetes. Meke-a soore-a yuoo prutect zee mester config.system.php feele-a fuoond in zee /var durectury su thet it is nut oofervreettee by iech eddeeshunel soobseete-a instell prucess. Cupy it oooot, und zeen poot it beck vhee yuoo hefe-a feenished zee instell fur zee soobseete-a(s).

entry.string: From the menu, you have four choices:
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a fuoor chueeces:

entry.string: Add Site - Once you have set up the Master Multisite Configuration
entry.translation: Edd Seete-a - Oonce-a yuoo hefe-a set up zee Mester Moolteesite-a Cunffeegooreshun

entry.string: View Sites - This option lists the Master site and all subsites. At this time, that is all it does :-)
entry.translation: Feeoo Seetes - Thees oopshun leests zee Mester seete-a und ell soobseetes. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Et thees teeme-a, thet is ell it dues :-)

entry.string: Admin Config - The admin configuration sets the number of sites listed per page in the View Sites option.
entry.translation: Edmeen Cunffeeg - Zee edmeen cunffeegooreshun sets zee noomber ooff seetes leested per pege-a in zee Feeoo Seetes oopshun.

entry.string: Multisites Module has no blocks included at this time.
entry.translation: Moolteesites Mudoole-a hes nu blucks inclooded et thees teeme-a.

entry.string: The Multisites Module has no hooks included.
entry.translation: Zee Moolteesites Mudoole-a hes nu huuks inclooded. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond here-a. [mudooles mudoole-a]
